dict.string: Dome-AI uses notifications to send you helpful nudges and reminders from Ray.
DomeAI uses speech recognition so you can talk to Ray hands-free.
DomeAI needs microphone access to enable voice conversations with Ray.
DomeAI uses your camera so Ray can help analyze photos and images.
DomeAI needs access to your photos so Ray can analyze and help with your images.
DomeAI needs permission to save photos to your library.
